title: An African community: the Masai
creator_credit: Frank Gardonyi, Clifford Janoff and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: This film shows how the nomadic Masai live in the highlands of East Africa. It describes their dependence on the land, their adaptation to the environment, and their family and tribal interdependence. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Gardonyi, Clifford Janoff and BFA Educational Media
